knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(brms)
```


```{r}
Bayesian_psychometic_model_object <- readRDS("Bayesian_psychometic_model_object.rds")
cd.long <- read_delim('colour_discriminate_long_format.txt' , delim='\t')
TW_col.dta1 <- readRDS("Bayesian_psychometic_model_object.rds")
```




```{r}
pp_check(Bayesian_psychometic_model_object,
         type = "rootogram", nsamples=2000, prob = 0.9, size = 1)
```



```{r}
pp_check(Bayesian_psychometic_model_object,
         type = "bars", nsamples=200, prob = 0.9, size = 1)
```
